hero.description: Helping those who defend our peace. The Bulwark Fund stands for transparency, integrity, and effective support.

about.lead: Â«BulwarkÂ» is a space where shared history and friendship between nations become the foundation for a common future.
about.p1: We are building a support network that will one day allow Belarusians to return home and bring the experience and values needed to build a new, free country.
about.p2: Investing in our fund is an investment in the stability of all Europe. A democratic Belarus is key to the security of the entire region.
about.stat_desc_1: We have a network of experts, a chatbot, and direct contact with fighters.
about.stat_desc_2: Every dictator falls. We are preparing the builders of a new Belarus.
about.quote: "Freedom has no borders, and tyranny is a common threat to the entire region."

history.title: Our Story
history.lead: The story of Â«BulwarkÂ» didn't start in an office, but through a meeting between a Ukrainian woman from Kharkiv and a Belarusian fighter.
history.alisa_text: was born in Kharkiv. Until February 24, 2022, she lived an ordinary life, but after the invasion began, she went through shelling and evacuation. She returned to Ukraine with a firm decision: this is her home.
history.vlad_text: is originally from Minsk. In 2020, he endured repression and torture at Akrestsina. With the start of the full-scale war, he did not hesitate to go and fight for Ukraine's freedom.
history.conclusion_1: Today they are building the Â«BulwarkÂ» fund together, uniting those who believe: freedom is everyone's right.

volunteers.title: Help for Fighters
volunteers.crit1_text: Only for Belarusian fighters (active military and veterans) who are fighting or have fought as part of the AFU / NGU.
volunteers.crit2_text: Consultations on legalization, document restoration, professional psychological support.
volunteers.warning: Important: We do not collect funds for weapons or ammunition. Our task is your legal and mental status.

activity.title: Systemic Assistance
activity.item1_text: Legalization in Ukraine, protection from extradition, and document restoration for those left without legal status.
activity.item2_text: Qualified help for PTSD, combat stress, and adaptation of warriors to civilian life.
activity.item3_text: Preparing personnel reserves for a new Belarus and launching humanitarian programs for fighters' families.

partners.title: How to Help the Fund
partners.type1_text: Financial support to pay for lawyers, psychologists, and office rent.

partners.type3_text: Discounts on services, rehabilitation programs, or locations for meetings.

donate.help_soldiers_text: Direct purchase of equipment, medicine, and technical supplies for Belarusian fighters at the front.
